# Making vectors!

### A character vector

```{r}
dogs <- c("teddy", "khora", "waffle", "banjo", "tallie")

class(dogs)
```

```{r}
cats <- c("creamsicle wolf", 14.2, 3L)
```

### A numeric vector

```{r}
weights <- c(50, 55, 25, 35)


class(weights)
```

### An integer vector

```{r}
dog_age <- c(5L, 6L, 1L, 7L)

class(dog_age)

is.numeric(dog_age)
```
